subject: Concussions
Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said that Sidney Crosby would miss Saturday’s game against the Boston Bruins, his fifth straight game, and would not be allowed to return to the ice until he was symptom-free.
snippet: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said that Sidney Crosby would miss Saturday’s game against the Boston Bruins, his fifth straight game, and would not be allowed to return to the ice until he was symptom-free.
